title: Test Automation Engineer (f/m/d)
body:
Who we are

At Bitpanda we are firm believers in the innovative power of cryptocurrencies, digitised assets and blockchain technology. As a result, Bitpanda has grown into a popular trading platform for newbies and experts alike. 

We are expanding rapidly and hence, we are seeking new, experienced and hands-on team members who think outside of the box (and are not afraid to share their thoughts), will deliver unique ideas and like to work in a fast-paced environment.

Your mission

As a Test Automation Engineer at Bitpanda, your mission is to ensure quality amongst all our products and features within the Bitpanda Ecosystem, through usability, closed/open beta testing, as well as using your creativity to improve processes and suggest additional solutions.

Our tools

  • Development IDE: Microsoft Visual Studio, IntelliJ IDEA, WebStorm

Your focus

  • Design automation components/modules that can be leveraged across multiple test scripts using a conventional automation framework
  • Perform triage, identify defects, and troubleshoot issues for front-end and back-end systems
  • Execute test automation script/cases and provide support during issue resolution process
  • Analyse and identify suitable candidates/appliances for test automation
  • Support test automation solution planning and estimation

Why you

  • Demonstrated experience in defining and implementing several test automation solutions leveraging one or more of the following: Selenium, Cucumber, Appium, SoapUI, TestNG, xUnit, NUnit, Nightwatch
  • Exposure to stress, reliability, security and performance testing using tools like: LoadRunner, Jmeter
  • Programming skills, preferably using any OOP/Functional language; familiarity with frontend technologies and web services architecture
  • Hands-on experience of working with one of the RDBMS tools would be desirable
  • You are extremely detail-oriented with the ability to adapt in a dynamic work environment and show strong communication skills

Why us

Bitpanda benefits

  • Flexible working hours
  • Latest hardware
  • Lunch and gym discount
  • Buddy program
  • Regular team events and a yearly team trip
  • Brand new office in the Viennese FinTech Hub
  • German classes


At Bitpanda, we strongly believe in the benefits of having a diverse team. Varied experiences, perspectives, and backgrounds lead to a better workplace and eventually to better products for our users. Thus, we actively foster diversity at Bitpanda. We believe in equal opportunities for everyone, no matter the nationality, skin colour, gender, religion, sexual orientation, age, seniority level, marital status, or disability status.

Bitpanda offers an ensured salary according to the collective agreement and a possible overpayment depending on the qualifications.
